name: Social Life (CharlieGray)
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 46.

Theme: Keep it alive

In "Social Life" you try to keep your Social Life alive by balancing the three aspects of Social Life: Energy, Fitness and - of course - Social

You are swarmed by opportunities that higher and lower these apsects and you must decide which of these opportunities you embrace and which you deflect.

As the game progresses more and more opportunities will swarm you and you have to decide quick to keep your three aspects in balance.
